title: Millions of People Are Dying from USAID Cuts
description:
This site is focused on cleantech for a reason. So many people are champions of cleantech because we want to protect human life and safety (and also life on Earth beyond humans). Every tech site covers solar and EVs now, because tehy’re simply “cool new tech.” Every automotive site covers ... [continued]

The post Millions of People Are Dying from USAID Cuts appeared first on CleanTechnica.
